edu.umd.cs.psl.evaluation.statistics

Class DiscretePredictionStatistics

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.umd.cs.psl.evaluation.statistics.DiscretePredictionStatistics
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PredictionStatistics

    public class DiscretePredictionStatistics
extends java.lang.Object
implements PredictionStatistics
    Statistics computed by a PredictionComparator which discretizes truth values before comparing them.
